remarks: Inference from Theorem 19.21 of [Margaris] p. 90 (restricted quantifier version).  This theorem contains the common proof steps for ~ ralrimi and ~ ralrimiv .  Its main advantage over these two is its minimal references to axioms.  The proof is extracted from NM's previous work. (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 4-Dec-2019.)
statement:
hbralrimi.1 $e |- ( ph -> A. x ph ) $.
hbralrimi.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A -> ps ) ) $.
hbralrimi $p |- ( ph -> A. x e. A ps ) $.
